caption.p: The dependence of AMF colonization (A) and root water potential (B) on population origin (light fill is native, dark fill is introduced). Each point is the mean Â± SE of a population (abbreviations from Supplementary Table S1) in the July (triangle) or August (circle) time block. * indicates P < 0.05 for the main effect of population origin (see Table 1 for full results. N = 4 except for population GL ( N = 8).
